steps.summary: GET /api/insights/ai_sector_risk/trend returns 200 OK with default days=30. Response includes category_id, days, trend array (1 datapoint), and metrics object with 6 metrics.
Custom days parameter works: days=60 returns days=60, days=90 returns days=90. Response reflects requested time range.
Parameter validation works: days=120 returns 422 "less than or equal to 90", days=-5 returns 422 "greater than or equal to 7". Valid range is 7-90 days.
TrendDataPoint structure verified: date (str YYYY-MM-DD), score (float 0-100), status (str: low/normal/elevated/high). All required fields present in both composite trend and per-metric trends.
